forkSession.title: Fork Session
forkSession.description: Create a new session branch from the selected checkpoint.

checkpointSettings.title: Checkpoint Settings
checkpointSettings.autoCheckpointDescription: Automatically create checkpoints based on the selected strategy
checkpointSettings.keepCountDescription: Number of checkpoints to keep (older ones will be cleaned up)
checkpointSettings.keepRecentDescription: Remove old checkpoints, keeping only the most recent {{count}}

warning.title: Experimental Feature
warning.description: Checkpointing may affect directory structure or cause data loss. Use with caution.

strategyDescriptions.manual: Checkpoints will only be created manually
strategyDescriptions.per_prompt: A checkpoint will be created after each user prompt
strategyDescriptions.per_tool_use: A checkpoint will be created after each tool use
strategyDescriptions.smart: Checkpoints will be created after destructive operations
